eu_initiatives: Air quality policies and legislation, plus related topics, such as vehicle emissions legislation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Through the IES, IAQM is a partner of the European Federation of Associations of Environmental Professionals (EFFAP)
relevant_communication:
Annual conference on air quality - 'Routes to Clean Air', held in October every year in the UK. 
Frequent discussion meetings on topical points of interest to our members, eg air quality policy and legislation  
Publication of guidance documents on air quality impact assessment.
goals__remit: The IAQM represents professionals working in the field of air quality.  It seeks to maintain, promote or enhance the highest standards of working practices for its members.
